quest.name: In His Memory
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Karnes is desperately searching for something.
objectives: Escort Varthon through Fort Gohn and find the abandoned blade.
Deliver the abandoned blade to Karnes.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: Thank you for finding him. I could never forgive myself if something had happened to him.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: I have to find it, Varthon. My father's sword...

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: He was on guard duty that day when the sin eaters attacked. He fought so hard to keep us safe... But I wish he would've thought to save himself.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: Not a day goes by I don't think of his sacrifice, and what little good I've done with it.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: I thought retrieving his sword from Fort Gohn would be a start.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: I... I didn't realize it meant that much to you.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: I should've been able to handle this on my own! There weren't even any sin eaters nearby, but still I ran away. I'm a coward, Varthon, a bloody coward!!!

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: Keep your voice down, before something hears you.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: I feel horrible for asking after I dragged you out here to find him, but I'd appreciate it if you could help a while longer.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: I can't stand to see him like this. Knowing him, the only thing that will get him out of this sour mood is finding his father's sword.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: Would you come with me to look for it? It should be somewhere near where his house used to be.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: Let's get moving, then.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: I'm sorry...

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: His house should be somewhere toward the heart of the settlement. Stay sharp. There's no telling what's lurking about.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM03445
dialogue.text: Escort Varthon through the ruins of Fort Gohn. Should you fail to defend him, or move too far away, he will return to the outskirts of Fort Gohn, where you may rendezvous with him before trying again.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: Let's try and do this quietly.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> I don't think I've ever run so fast in my life. Let's try to be a little more careful, okay?

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: This is too much. I have to fall back.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM03445
dialogue.text: You have failed to successfully escort Varthon.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM03445
dialogue.text: Return to the outskirts of Fort Gohn and speak with Varthon to begin once more.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM03445
dialogue.text: You have lost sight of Varthon. Retrace your steps to find them, then escort them safely to the ruins of Fort Gohn.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: (-Varthon-)Hmmm... No, that's not right. The pattern on the hilt is all wrong.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: (-Varthon-)There! That's it!

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: Oh, I can't wait to see the look on Karnes's face.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: I can't go back without that sword. I won't.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: He's going to be so happy to see that sword.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: By the blessed Dark, you found it! Holding this sword, it feels like he's right here beside me.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: I remember that day, when the sin eaters came. His father was one of the bravest men I've ever met.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: I'm sure he would have wanted you to have it.
